title.value: AmbieGen: A Search-based Framework for Autonomous Systems Testing
title.justification: The title is clearly mentioned at the top of the provided research paper.
title.quote: AmbieGen: A Search-based Framework for Autonomous Systems Testing

extractions.description: This paper explores AmbieGen, a framework designed for the generation of test scenarios for autonomous systems using evolutionary search. It aims to identify critical scenarios to thoroughly test systems such as lane-keeping assist in vehicles and autonomous robot navigation.

type.justification: The paper describes practical implementations and experiments with AmbieGen on lane-keeping assist systems and autonomous robots, showcasing empirical results and evaluations.
type.quote: In this paper, we provide a high-level overview of the frameworkâ€™s architecture and demonstrate its practical use cases.

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on testing autonomous systems, specifically through generating adversarial test scenarios using a framework called AmbieGen.
name.quote: Thorough testing of safety-critical autonomous systems, such as self-driving cars, autonomous robots, and drones, is essential for detecting potential failures before deployment.

name.justification: The paper emphasizes the use of evolutionary search algorithms to generate test scenarios for autonomous systems.
name.quote: By leveraging evolutionary search AmbieGen allows to find challenging and diverse test scenarios.

name.justification: DeepJanus is mentioned as one of the approaches for generating virtual environments for testing autonomous systems.
name.quote: Several approaches have been proposed for generating virtual environments for testing autonomous driving and robotics systems, including... DeepJanus.

is_contributed.justification: The model was referenced in the paper but not contributed by the authors.
is_contributed.quote: Several approaches have been proposed for generating virtual environments for testing autonomous driving and robotics systems, including... DeepJanus.

is_executed.justification: It is just referenced, not executed within the scope of this paper.
is_executed.quote: Several approaches have been proposed for generating virtual environments for testing autonomous driving and robotics systems, including... DeepJanus.

is_compared.justification: There is no direct numerical comparison between AmbieGen and DeepJanus within the scope of the paper.
is_compared.quote: Several approaches have been proposed for generating virtual environments for testing autonomous driving and robotics systems, including... DeepJanus.

name.justification: Pymoo is mentioned as a significant library utilized for implementing the evolutionary search algorithms within AmbieGen.
name.quote: We use the Pymoo framework to implement the search algorithms.

referenced_paper_title.justification: This title is found in the references related to Pymoo.
